text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Donald Trump killed 130,000 Americans by not working to protect us from COVID-19 at all because he's freaking stupid and an egomaniac.

Oh... and he also only cares about transnational organized crime, aka the worldwide mafia aka MOB.
